article_title: Messenger: 'Amazing Grace' is a prayer for the nation
article_text:

article_metadata.description: On Friday afternoon President Barack Obama ended perhaps one of the most profound speeches of his life by starting to sing, one slow bar at a time, "Amazing Grace"
article_metadata.author: Tony Messenger
